thread.title: Ground News - Sudbury's hospital draw Friday will be worth more than $1 million
thread.title_full: Ground News - Sudbury's hospital draw Friday will be worth more than $1 million

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Sudbury's hospital draw Friday will be worth more than $1 million
text:
Summary by Ground News The biggest HSN 50/50 Cash Lottery for the North take-home prize to date just hit more than $1 million for the second time in its three-and-a-half-year history. The deadline to purchase tickets for the December draw is 11:59 p.m. on Thursday, December 28. The jackpot-winning ticket will be drawn on Friday, Dec. 29, and posted online at www.hsn5050.ca. Share menu More
